member.name: P:MediMatchRMIT.Classes.TokenProviderOptions.Path
member.summary: The relative request path to listen on.

member.name: P:MediMatchRMIT.Classes.TokenProviderOptions.Issuer
member.summary: The Issuer (iss) claim for generated tokens.

member.name: P:MediMatchRMIT.Classes.TokenProviderOptions.Audience
member.summary: The Audience (aud) claim for the generated tokens.

member.name: P:MediMatchRMIT.Classes.TokenProviderOptions.Expiration
member.summary: The expiration time for the generated tokens.

member.summary: The signing key to use when generating tokens.

member.summary: Resolves a user identity given a username and password.

member.name: P:MediMatchRMIT.Classes.TokenProviderOptions.NonceGenerator
member.summary: Generates a random value (nonce) for each generated token.
member.remarks: The default nonce is a random GUID.
